table.name: vtiger_postsales
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_postsales` ( `postsalesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `salesorder_postsales` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `approval_related` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `approved_on` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL, `month_related` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `approvedby` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tabid` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `approval_status` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`postsalesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_postsalescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_postsalescf` ( `vtiger_postsalescf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_postsalescf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
